channel.title: ACCCidental Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Nick Twort
channel.description: A special podcast focussed on reviewing and analysing ACCC reports. We break down complex regulatory information, making it accessible and engaging for listeners interested in consumer rights, market competition, and regulatory affairs in Australia.

item.title: Episode 3: ACCC's Interim Report on the Grocery Inquiry
item.itunes:author: Nick Twort
item.description: In our newest episode, we delve into the ACCC's interim report for the grocery inquiry, examining the findings on competition, pricing, and market dynamics in Australia's grocery sector.

item.title: Episode 2: Examining Multimodal Foundation Models
item.itunes:author: Nick Twort
item.description: In this episode, we dive into the paper 'Examination of technology: Multimodal Foundation Models' by DP-REG, exploring the implications of this cutting-edge technology on regulatory landscapes.

item.title: Episode 1: Understanding the ACCC's Digital Platform Services Inquiry report 8
item.itunes:author: Nick Twort
item.description: In our inaugural episode, we explore the ACCC's Digital Platform Services Inquiry's 8th report.
